title: The.Monster.From.The.East.2008
description:
From Romania comes the first romanian creature movie. Teaser Trailer. It opens Fall 2008 wide. And the trailer on may 1 on EasternMonster.ro

Synopsis:
Two high-school boys awake a dormant monster from Hades that was hiding in their attik. As total mayhem ensues, the creature rampages through their school eating their classmates and teachers, the two boys have to come up with something good to kill the beast. Their only solution is a fellow friend who knows how to put back to sleep the beast. But all comes with a price... their parent&#039;s death... and their innocent souls. It is said that the creature will fall back to sleep if it has collected 666 souls. 

Stay tune... we&#039;ll keep you update on how many souls the beast has gathered... and when yours is next!
